name: Car Crash Arena: Endless Chase
description:
Drive away from the police at full speed, until they caught you. Beware of obstacles as long as possible. Buy new cars with improved features. Catch the drive and adrenaline. Become the best and beat all records.
The mechanics of the game is very simple, two control buttons with quick restart. No time to learn, no tutorial, no unnecessary settings to tweak when you just want to play.

- Earn credits by playing and viewing ads.
- Sound track for pumping adrenaline from DL SOUNDS
- FREE with ads: video ads also give you game credits
- Cool drift physics
- Lots of explosions and fun!
